name: Graveyard Sprint
description:
Graveyard Sprint is a 3D parkour game that combines gothic style with exciting gameplay. In the game, you will play as a human trying to escape a graveyard while avoiding chasing zombies. You must perform various difficult jumping and rolling actions to safely escape. The game is easy to control, and players only need to use the up, down, left and right arrow keys to control the character to jump and roll, avoiding obstacles and the pursuit of zombies.

The game features captivating gothic style design that creates a sinister and terrifying cemetery world, providing players with a sense of urgency and fear. In addition, the game is quite challenging, requiring players to practice and improve their skills to complete higher level challenges.

Graveyard Sprint is an exciting and challenging parkour game that not only provides players with intense gameplay but also a unique gothic style experience. Come and take on the challenge!
